question.xref: DES s6, HC r127, HC p114, KYTS p62
question.text: This broken white line painted in the centre of the road means

explanation.text: A long white line with short gaps means that you are approaching a hazard. If you do need to cross it, make sure that the road is clear well ahead.

answer.text: oncoming vehicles have priority over you
you should give priority to oncoming vehicles
there is a hazard ahead of you
the area is a national speed limit zone
